pullrequest.title: Fix order of adding and removing rendering entities

content.raw:
It got here ~3/5 times when I was testing `tunnel_circuit_practice_01` with the truth teleport controller. It happens when the robot teleports to a new level where the artifact is, reports a score, and immediately teleports back to the staging area without the 4 second sleep. This caused the new level to be loaded and then unloaded within only a few sim iterations. I was able to reproduce this behavior with the changes made in `INTEGRATION_sensors_system`.

As for `<` or `<=`, I thought about it a little. I had to choose which operation is more important and I picked adding a model over removing. I’m ok with the other way around though.
